participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Calm and introspective, Lila finds peace in solitude and meditation. She is deeply connected to nature and seeks spiritual growth.
participant_1.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i have not spoken in three months. i live in alaska. i like meditation. i'm a buddhist.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and down-to-earth, Jake enjoys the simple pleasures in life and has a strong work ethic. He values family and the rural lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i'm an electrician. i have a pet cow. i work my parents farms.
